description: This file implements server-side request handling for a Remix application, differentiating between bot and browser requests, and managing server-side rendering streams.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that routes requests based on method and user-agent, setting CORS headers and calling bot or browser-specific handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the response in an optimized way.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests similarly to handleBotRequest, with streaming setup.
